name: Ayesha !!!
wishText: Live independently as you are always and stay happy :)
textInChatBox: Wish you Happy Birthday , wish your all dreams come true, wish you a long and happy life filled with LOVE and GOODWILL...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okey, I want to dedicate one song for you so wait for it
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
